children.name: Doughney registered peta.org ('people eating tasty animals')
registered ﬁfty domain names and tried to sell peta.org
held to infringe because of bad faith intent to proﬁt
there was initial interest confusion but Doughney made no effort to clear the confusion
I don’t understand why it’s bad faith in the PETA case? #profques #profans It’s because Doughney registered multiple domain names that he knew were PETA’s distinctive name.
